title: Welcome to the RNG-Hellscape
goal: Introduce Artie and his broken 'Crit-Only' status in a high-stakes environment.
stakes_shift: Artie transforms from a mundane office drone into a level 1 glitch in a lethal game world.

bridge.to_next: Artie must find a way to survive his first night in the wild with zero defensive stats.

sections.title: The Exit Interview
sections.intent: Establish Artie's mundane life and sudden, absurd death.

scenes.summary: Artie argues with a vending machine over a bag of chips before a freak electrical surge sends him to the great login screen in the sky.
scenes.outcome: Artie dies and enters the System's character creation void.

scenes.summary: The System, personified as a snarky UI, mocks Artie's life choices while he accidentally dumps all his points into the 'Crit' stat.
scenes.outcome: Artie is locked into a 'Crit or Quit' build with 1 HP and 100% Critical Hit rate.
scenes.end_condition_echo: Artie locks in his 'Crit or Quit' build with 1 HP and 100% Critical Hit rate.

sections.title: The First Spawn
sections.intent: Show the immediate danger of a 1 HP build in a hostile tutorial zone.

scenes.summary: Artie spawns in the middle of a tutorial zone and is immediately targeted by a Level 1 Slime that looks suspiciously aggressive.
scenes.outcome: Artie realizes that in this world, '1 HP' means a stiff breeze could kill him.

scenes.summary: Artie tries to punch the slime; he misses five times before landing a 'Super-Mega-Ultra-Crit' that vaporizes the slime and the tree behind it.
scenes.outcome: Artie gains his first level and realizes his power is terrifyingly inconsistent.

scenes.summary: The System awards Artie a 'Participation Trophy' item that actually attracts monsters.
scenes.outcome: Artie is forced to run for his life as the tutorial zone aggros on him.
scenes.end_condition_echo: Artie is forced to run for his life as the tutorial zone aggros on him.

sections.title: The Safe Zone?
sections.intent: Reach the first hub and establish the world's culture and primary rivalry.

scenes.summary: Artie reaches the gates of Oakhaven, where the guards are busy betting on the 'Crit-Rate' of incoming travelers.
scenes.outcome: Artie enters the town but is flagged as a 'Statistical Anomaly' by the gate scanners.

scenes.summary: Artie meets Barnaby, the local Tavern Keeper, who explains that 'Crits' are the only currency that matters to the local nobility.
scenes.outcome: Artie understands his 'broken' stat makes him a target for the powerful.

scenes.summary: A high-level Paladin, Vane, notices Artie's glowing 'Anomaly' aura and decides to 'mentor' him (bully him).
scenes.outcome: Artie makes his first rival and barely escapes a forced duel.
scenes.end_condition_echo: Artie makes his first rival in Vane and barely escapes a forced duel.
